message: Let's be fair and split close to 50/50, with a slight advantage for me to start.  We both lose money if this drags on!
Your turn to feel the (slight) disadvantage of going second. I propose we simply reverse your previous offer to save time and minimize losses to inflation.
Bob, let's be real. This back and forth is pointless. We both lose with every round. I propose a fair 50/50 split so we can both walk away with something.
